subject: Order enquirie
description_text:
Hello I just received my pedals and shifter today, all is well and very happy with them but the optional shifter plate I ordered to fit the handbrake is missing? Is there anyway we could resolve this please

My order number is #SSN3343

Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi jake gunter,    We apologise for the inconvenience and will arrange for a replacement to be sent to you.

Hi no problem at all, thank you very much for getting that sent out amazing service

Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi jake gunter,    Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047061685051
